location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that His Majesty's Ship Aconhad been dispatched to the Persian Gulf to give protection to trade and requesting to provide Captain Prior with information on the Joasimese [Qasimi] or any other Piratical tribes.
